articles.title: Over 100 Indian startups laid off more than 15,000 staff this year: Report | Mint - Mint
articles.description: Several Indian startups, including Ola, ShareChat, and Swiggy, laid off more than 100 employees this year. Globally, 1,160 tech companies laid off 2,602,238 employees in 2023. Indian startups saw a 65.8% drop in funding between January and November.
